cmu.title: Central Michigan University
cmu.major: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
info: Led the development of a full-stack web application using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in a 20% improvement in data processing efficiency for the user.
Completed advanced coursework in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Machine Learning, with a specialized focus on neural networks and natural language processing.
Maintained a 3.9 GPA while earning a place on the Dean's List for four consecutive semesters and receiving the Grace Hopper Scholarship for women in computing.

springboard.title: Springboard Cybersecurity Career Track
info: Developed an adversarial mindset by learning to identify common web application vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10) and implementing secure coding practices to prevent them.

Gained hands-on experience in vulnerability assessment and threat modeling through 50+ technical labs, providing critical context for building secure back-end services and defending against common attack vectors.
Completed an intensive, project-based curriculum focused on defensive security principles, application security, secure coding practices, and cloud security fundamentals.

24g.title: Software Development Intern
info: Gained hands-on experience working with REST APIs, including making requests, handling responses, and integrating them into applications.
Developed skills in Vue, NodeJS, and SCSS, demonstrating proficiency by accurately developing client-specified front-end applications.
Implemented precise UI/UX when translating mockups into accessible and responsive front-end applications.
Engaged in effective communication and collaboration with team members to complete project objectives.
Adaptively managed and incorporated client revisions while maintaining adherence to project deadlines.
Intuitively enhanced user experience by implementing seamless transitions, micro-interactions, and engaging loading animations, leading to a client-favorite convention application.
Became proficient in adapting and understanding different codebases of various sizes.
Used Git to effectively manage code versions, collaborate with team members, and track project progress.
